job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   Rotterdam
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past
job_details.full_text:
Backend (Cloud) Software Engineer

Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   Rotterdam
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend software engineering within a cloud-native, Kubernetes environment, and mentions LLM applications. However, it lacks specific details about the core generative AI tasks such as fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or building RAG systems, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile. While it mentions LLM applications, the emphasis is on the backend infrastructure and integration rather than the direct development or adaptation of generative models. The role appears to be more of a traditional backend/cloud engineer supporting LLM applications rather than a specialist in generative AI model development or application.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'developing high-performance, scalable software solutions', 'designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform', 'Implement robust backend systems', and 'seamless integration with backend systems', which are core software development activities.
The role involves building and maintaining production-grade software systems, specifically a cloud platform for LLM applications.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform

job_tasks.justification: The job involves implementing backend systems using infrastructure frameworks.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks

job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with DevOps and front-end teams for integration points to software development and system integration responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems

job_tasks.justification: Driving test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation are standard software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments' and 'distributed systems' points towards operational aspects of deploying and managing software in the cloud.
Working with 'cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack' implies operational considerations for cloud infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform
